title: Onyeeze
author: Onyeeze
content: Since 2015 another party called all progressive congress take over power things have not be going well for our country Nigerian, the statistics shown that since 2018 we have experience hardship.2018 /2019 = coronaviru2020 / 2021 = End SARS2022/2023 = fuel scarcity / bank, POS challenges due to implementation of new currency.What the scarcity of fuel in the country have not known what's the caused of it, meanwhile the scarcity of the new currency have be investigated and notice that the brain behind it is the politicians arrangements with bank Managers, make una no say this country is one kind thing we don't know were is taking us to. You can't withdraw more than twenty thousand in the bank and some banks no dey even pay common ten thousand for the citizens. Pos people is now charging 5000 naira with 1000 naira and sone point is charging 1500, now you have money but you can't feed well, you have money you cannot withdraw and when you to ATM machine to withdraw you stay till next day before it will get to your turn, for we to correct all this mess is to vote wisely, bad governance have killed Nigerian

comments.author: Obari
comments.created_time: February 07, 2023, 11:26:40 AMLast edit: February 07, 2023, 11:40:06 AM by Obari
comments.body: Even the holy bible been don talk say the people will suffer when the wick rules but abeg I no dey tag anybody wicked but just let your heart do the judgement.Of everything you don talk, na the fact day politicians lias with bank managers to stack the new currency just for them to use during the election for their selfish political interest is truly a call for concern and I do feel so bad about it because the so called politicians with manifestos of taking the people out of poverty dey on the other hand dey put is more for the bondage and I dey feel really bad and the worst of all na fuel matter wey come join the money matter and to crown It all na the way pos attendants dey act this days and I no believe say I withdraw 10k with charges of 3k and I really felt so bad

comments.author: Zaguru12
comments.body: Nigeria has been in down turn throughout this administration.First the Fuel scarcity is as a result of the subsidy removal done by government. Although the government said they haven’t it the price of the fuel yet but there is report that it was indeed increased which resulted in scarcity. Then the Marketer hike their own price which in turn had his hardship on the citizens. The lack of acceptance of old notes by the fuel stations is also another reason.Gracefully the election is close and people could correct their mistakes by voting out the bad politicians. But this current situation in the current has made me to realize that the government is just a quarter of our problem but we ourselves are the major problems. Imagine people hiking everything like POS withdrawal fee and also food stuffs in market having variety of price depending on the kind of money you are using to purchase the goods. Those with new money buy less costly than those with old notes. Bank managers hiding the new notes and disbursing to only some specific people that could bring gain to them.Before we vote out the bad politicians we need to correct our own mindset because I only see citizen looking for the opportunity to pounce on the country funds if given the opportunity. CHANGE BEGINS WITH US

comments.author: Silver005
comments.body: My dear, this is a clear sign that this people we call our leaders are not for us they are against us, and the funny thing is the kind of promises during the election period, don't be surprised that one day politician will promise to take us to heaven,but it is for those who they can decieve, not me, I can never trust any political,but out of all ever since I was born this is the worst government so far,is only God will save us in this country, I depends on God only and not on human being.

comments.author: Merit.s
comments.body: Nigeria citizens need to use their head for this forth coming election to vote the right person if not many more suffer na e the country go face. Imagine say the naria wey suppose dey everywhere banks carry am dey hoard for politicians because of that the banks no fit give their customers the amount wey customers want. After we go say na politicians abi bank manager too na politics ? We need to see say side bribe to do bad thing wey fit suffer the masses no good,therefore we need to change our orientation on corruption wey we feel say na smartness.

comments.author: Belarge
comments.body: This APC government refused to tackle subsidy and that is the major cause of the scarcity of fuel, and na only we wey be citizens nai dey feel the pain, this politicians get where Dem dey go pack fuel full inside their cars,If you go filling station now, a litre of fuel is 500 naira, and with the price of fuel now, everything don over cost, transportation don become another thing for us, we dey really suffer,The government leave the major problems of Nigeria, go dey change currency, wetin the old currency do them na, abi we tell Dem say na to change currency our problem?Now Dem dey try to use the change of currency dey play politics, we know them and we know say na wetin Dem dey do be that,Stroll go banks go see suffer wey people dey suffer to withdraw their own money wey Dem deposit for banks, the suffering is just too much, if you go POS, POS people go want use charge kill you, I just tire...Nai make I dey urge people say make we come together, collect our PVCs and vote out this APC people because Dem no care about us, they care about themselves alone

comments.author: Mr.suevie
comments.body: Dem talk if something no do you, you no go believe say something dey. This our case of hardship and heavy starvation has gotten to everyone now that why we Nigerians are trying to make things right again and select a leader who we believe can do something tangible at large for the nation. If this country continues like this,  i would not be surprised if we experience a civil war in the country

comments.author: HajiBagi
comments.body: The Nigeria situation is getting worst every day, can someone please tell me when this our country will be free from corruption?  The politicians who we are trying to vote for are the one who are treating us bad by bribing the banks managers to get a new naira note, and they did not think of what will happen to the citizens who are the ones that will vote for them, seriously Nigeria is really need of prayers if not our leaders are really not human again.

comments.author: CryptopreneurBrainboss
comments.body: Although I no agree with everything you talk but you see that title wey you put so say na Nigerians be the cause of our own problem, na the koko be dat. Nigerians no dey learn from history and now our biggest problem be dat. We dey elect people wey no understand how to govern a country. How the arms wey dey govern the country no go dey work together. How CBN go dey talk another thing and the government dey talk a different thing. How division go dey and we dey expect the country to dey move forward.COVID no be Nigeria cause am but wat about the ASUU strike and other factors that frustrate the typical Nigeria youths. 2020 was Coronavirus/ASUU strike. Now 2023 na fuel scarcity. Asin how you go frustrate the country from head to toe, e no make sense alt all and make we no make a similar mistake come 2023 make we no vote party again instead make we dey vote individual excellence. I wish we fit abolish the party system and do individual campaign wey be say we go dey vote people and not party.

comments.body: D gud tin way I realise nd go lik relate 2 us b say, we b all Nigerans 4 here. E no end 2 jst dey talk or blame govmnt, na say u kwa go do ur own so dat, e go beta 4 our pple nd u kwa go get certification say u b instrument of change.D idea of chop ur own wen u gt chnace don spoil d nation nd make som pple weaked. Evri body wan do en own wen e dey position of power.I bin dey opportuned 2 lock one feeling station weeks bck nd I see as pple dey beg 2 buy fuel 4 d Station becus, dem sell cheap. Normally, everybody no ft congest d station nd so, dem gat dey com in with a particular order. So many pple step up 2 bribe there way in, #200, #500 nd so on. Sincerely, notin dat kind money even though accumulated go do 4 my bodi so, i no even reason am. Som try tease me say, na me get power, mak I allow dem bt, I gat use d opportunity tell my pple say, no b me get power, na God nd 2 buy fuel na dere right, dem no suppose dey beg or bribe 2 enter. If I wan favour u, I go favour u without a price on it. Jst dat, dem gats follow order way orders dey follow until fuel finish or dem close work 4 d day.D tin b say, we don dey oppressed so tay, we dey beg 4 our right nd we dey transfer our suffering 2 order innocent Nigerians, e dey dat bad. Hopefully, evry every go change with Obi or at least, e ft giv us small change if we giv am chance.Na why, we dey obligated 2 participate 4 d forth coming election, mak we nation 4 better.
